experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: I heard about Africa to Silicon Valley from my friends and I was excited to join. Before joining A2SV I dreamt about solving real-world problems and attaining something that I could focus on and make myself better from it. At that time, it is safe to say, I knew very little about data structure and algorithms. It was because of the A2SV program that I got comfortable with algorithms. From the program, students also learn about improving communication skills and being confident besides acquiring problem-solving skills.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: Google is a great place to work. You will work with the brightest minds in the world and find yourself moving forward. Their culture is great and inclusive, especially their free food!

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: I believe I would have not made it to Google if not for A2SV. In fact, I would not have got this far if it wasn't for A2SV. I don't even think we would have such type of opportunities if it was not for this organization. Previously, I used to think working at FAANG was impossible for us but A2SV changed my mindset. Now, we know that it is possible to work anywhere as long as one works hard and utilizes opportunities.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: My dream before joining Africa to Silicon Valley was to expand my realm of competence and knowledge. At A2SV, I found myself surrounded by many smart and driven people who were dedicated to sharing their knowledge and helping each other succeed.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: I am a part-time developer, looking forward to boosting my technical skills and overcoming the next challenge.

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: I was so excited when I made it to the A2SV program. A2SV helped me sharpen my problem-solving and analysis skills. It taught me the value of not just working hard but also working smart through a culture that promotes and improves through continuous feedback. The A2SV organization was a crucial factor in helping me attain an internship at Google.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: By being a part of A2SV, I got the chance to work and collaborate on real-world problems and gained more value through preparing for interviews with big tech companies. I also made really good friends.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: I enjoyed my time at Google as an intern. I got to work and learn from very disciplined and experienced engineers.

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: When I proved successful for the internship at Google, I remember being excited to spend the next 3 months there because of the positive culture, atmosphere, and all the perks. Without A2SV, I probably would not have ended up at Google.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: When I became a part of the Africa to Silicon Valley program, I wanted to learn a lot and get the opportunity to work on something impactful. A2SV has helped me develop my personal and technical skills, giving me valuable knowledge and experience. It helped me get exposure to big tech companies in the world. This enabled me to interact with a lot of smart people and be able to learn from them.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: I am currently working on a very unique role in software engineering with some customers facing interactions. I am learning so much every day and acquiring a lot of skills. I have found the culture in Palantir to be amazing. Everyone is very smart and nice. Getting more work opportunities and quality education for more people in Africa will help us solve a lot of our problems, and I would like to contribute to making that happen.

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: I was really excited when I got my internship at Palantir. I think A2SV played a big role in getting me this opportunity by preparing me for my interviews, giving me experience by working on projects, and getting me connected with the company.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: All I thought about before joining Africa to Silicon Valley was to complete university with good grades, continue my Masters and PhD soon after, and find a good influential job after that. I was excited to join A2SV but did not believe that what we achieved was possible.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: The environment at Google is challenging yet comfortable, full of learning, encouraging, and inspiring. I hope to turn my experiences and learnings into a tool I can use to boost the already fast-paced growth of Africa.

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: Getting a place at Google made me ecstatic! I was so excited to embark on this new wonderful journey. I am proud and thankful for A2SV. I definitely would not have made it without them. A2SV made me believe in what I thought was impossible. It taught me priceless lessons and skills.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: Initially, I just wanted to be a good student and perhaps pursue a masters degree soon after my bachelors degree. A2SV exposed me to an amazing culture where there is great team spirit in all things and at all times.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: Palantir is very independent and impact-driven. There are a lot of responsibilities for each engineer and we are expected to have big values within teams.

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: I felt so proud of myself when I got the place at Palantir. Without A2SV, I would have not made it or even know how an interview is done. A2SV showed me many possibilities and gave me a taste of the interviews.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: Knowing the low compensation for a software engineer in Ethiopia, my hope was to work remotely on online freelancing platforms like UpWork. The experience at Africa to Silicon Valley became life-changing! It opened up a whole new world for me and I was inspired to dream bigger. I also made amazing friends along the way.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: Work is challenging, but my teammates are friendly and willing to help.

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: It felt really good finding out I got the job at Databricks. I had put a lot of effort into this and had to wait patiently for it to happen, but it was worth it in the end. It was all because of A2SV. I never imagined I would be able to accomplish something like this soon after finishing my undergraduate studies at AAU in Ethiopia. I always assumed that I had to graduate from a well-known university in the United States or Europe.

experience.title: My A2SV Experience
experience.content: I had a dream to get a job as a full-time software engineer in Addis Ababa. The A2SV program was a great experience. The coursework was very structured. A2SVians are awesome! We had trips, and fun activities during the program. In short, the A2SV organization creates the best teams.

currentStatus.title: What I did/I am doing now
currentStatus.content: I am a software engineer on a project called flood forecasting. My teammates were very welcoming and happy to help. The best thing about Google is there is something new to learn every day. I would like to contribute to Africa by mitigating natural disasters using AI/machine learning. If we know ahead of time, that some natural disasters can happen, we can minimize the damage they can cause. One good example is Google's flood forecasting initiative. Check it out: [Google's flood forecasting initiative](shorturl.at/diDM6)

howChanged.title: How the A2SV program changed my life
howChanged.content: I was super excited when I got the job opportunity at Google. I don't think I would have made it without A2SV. A2SV helped me by providing well-structured coursework to pass technical and behavioral interviews. The coursework included competitive programming, mock interviews, accent reduction, communication skills, etc. All of these are very essential to crack interviews at tech companies.
